verbs.description: The first lady wakes in her own bedroom a bit later , [V: according] to two close friends of the Trumps . She then readies their 12-year - old son for school , including

The first lady wakes in her own bedroom a bit later , according to two close friends of the Trumps . [ARG0: She] [ARGM-TMP: then] [V: readies] [ARG1: their 12-year - old son] [ARG3: for school] , [ARGM-ADV: including]
